00031 RainbruRPG::Terminal::PushButton::PushButton(){
00032   actionSet=false;
00033   this->setX( 0 );
00034   this->setY( 0 );
00035   this->canTakeFocus=true;
00036   caption=new Caption( H_CENTERED, "", 0, 0, this->width, this->height );
00037 
00038 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::PushButton::draw( int x, int y ){
00098   int xw=(x+this->x)-2;
00099   int yw=(y+this->y)-1;
00100 
00101 
00102   if (hasFocus){
00103     SLsmg_set_color (1);
00104     SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw);
00105     for (int i=0; i< this->width; i++)
00106       SLsmg_printf( " " );
00107   }
00108 
00109   caption->setXPos( xw );
00110   caption->setYPos( yw );
00111   caption->setWidth( this->width );
00112   caption->setHeight( this->height );
00113 
00114   SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw);
00115   SLsmg_printf( "<" );
00116   SLsmg_gotorc (yw, xw+this->width);
00117   SLsmg_printf( ">" );
00118 
00119   caption->draw();
00120 
00121   SLsmg_set_color (0);
00122 }

00124 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::PushButton::receiveKeyEvent(int ch){
00125 
00126   if (ch==13){ //Enter
00127     int a=fireAction();
00128     if (a==-1)
00129       TerminalApp::getSingleton().showMessage( "This PushButton has no action set."); 
00130   }
00131 }
00132 
00138 int RainbruRPG::Terminal::PushButton::fireAction(){
00139   if (actionSet){
00140     int ret=(*(fptr))();
00141     return ret;
00142   }
00143   else{
00144     return -1;
00145   }
00146 }
00147 
00174 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::PushButton::setAction(FuncPtr a){
00175   actionSet=true;
00176   this->fptr=a;
00177 }
